org.apache.flink.streaming.api.invokable

Class StreamInvokable<IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.invokable.StreamInvokable<IN,OUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    OUT - The output type of the invokable
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoInvokable, CounterInvokable, FilterInvokable, FlatMapInvokable, GroupedWindowInvokable, MapInvokable, ProjectInvokable, SinkInvokable, SourceInvokable, StreamReduceInvokable, WindowInvokable

    public abstract class StreamInvokable<IN,OUT>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The StreamInvokable represents the base class for all invokables in the streaming topology.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
